description: Creates a theme alias for a theme.

parameters.name: AwsAccountId
parameters.description: The ID of the Amazon Web Services account that contains the theme for the new theme alias.

parameters.name: ThemeId
parameters.description: An ID for the theme alias.

parameters.name: AliasName
parameters.description: The name that you want to give to the theme alias that you are creating. The alias name can't begin with a $. Alias names that start with $ are reserved by Amazon QuickSight.

parameters.name: ThemeVersionNumber
parameters.description: The version number of the theme.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the theme alias.

nested_items.name: AliasName
nested_items.description: The display name of the theme alias.

nested_items.name: ThemeVersionNumber
nested_items.description: The version number of the theme alias.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The HTTP status of the request.

nested_items.name: RequestId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services request ID for this operation.
